cards.calloutText:
BONUS: In the spirit of the holidays we‚Äôre taking down the paywall for Lever Time Premium (the extended version of Lever Time which is usually available only to supporting subscribers) and sharing this week‚Äôs bonus segment with everyone. This past week, David sat down with former U.S. Senator and presidential candidate Gary Hart for a long-form conversation about the evolution of American politics since the late 1980s, and his new book about saving American democracy (52:11).

To get access to Lever Time Premium and all of its bonus content, go here.

sections: In the new episode of our  weekly podcast

, David Sirota discusses one of the country‚Äôs first-ever dark money disclosure laws passed during the recent midterms ‚Äî Arizona Proposition 211 ‚Äî and speaks with former Arizona Attorney General Terry Goddard, who has spent the better part of the last decade fighting to get the law passed (4:37).
In addition, David is joined by Jordan Uhl, who has been covering last week‚Äôs

in which thousands of Taylor Swift fans learned the hard way what happens when antitrust law isn‚Äôt enforced. The two were also joined by Max Collins, frontman for the rock band Eve 6, who has firsthand experience with the abusive practices of the giant corporations that now control the music industry (25:46).
